casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Dominic SALLITTO, Appellant, v. COMMISSIONER OF IMMIGRATION, Ellis Island, New York Harbor, Respondent. No. 70. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 19, 1936. Carol King, of New York City (Isaac Shorr, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lamar Hardy, of New York City (William F. Young, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee. Leonard E. Ruisi, of Brooklyn, N. Y., amici curiae.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
